article.Heading: Congress to support GST relief, says Kamal Nath
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee caught up Senior Congress Leader, Kamal Nath, who said that the Congress will support the measures that will help ease GST compliance. He also talked about the steps needed to put growth back on track.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee caught up Senior Congress Leader, Kamal Nath, who said that the Congress will support the measures that will help ease GST compliance. He also talked about the steps needed to put growth back on track.

Watch video for more...
